Question: ["Did Hughes sell his majority interest in Transcontinental & Western Air (TWA) in the 2004 movie 'The Aviator'?"]
Answer: [NO]

Question: ["In the 2004 movie 'The Aviator', did Hughes purchase a majority interest in Transcontinental & Western Air (TWA)?"]

Question: "In the 2004 movie 'The Aviator', did Juan Trippe, the founder and chairman of Pan Am, fail to introduce the Community Airline Bill?"
Answer: NO

Answer: YES
